Want to upload a different image?

Pixel Painter allows you create pixel art photos using either our built-in images or your own photos.

 1. Choose an Image
 • Default Images: Select from our preloaded pictures.
 • Custom Images: Upload a photo from your device, which becomes a paint-by-number canvas.

 2. Customize Your Painting
 • Choose grid size (4×4, 8×8, 16×16, 24×24, 32×32, 48×48, 64×64)
 • Choose a color palette (4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16)

 3. Paint the Canvas
 • Toggle Numbers: Show or hide number overlays.
 • Paint Mode: Tap colors and fill in the grid.
 • Touch Mode: Zoom and pan without painting.

 4. Finish
 • Admire your artwork
 • Return to the main menu
 • Share your painting with friends
